about_the_game:
Description:

Get ready for the ultimate neon-style survivors shooter experience! In this adrenaline-fueled multiplayer game, you'll battle against hordes of enemies that relentlessly come at you. With each level up, you'll have the opportunity to upgrade your character, unlocking new abilities that will make you stronger and more formidable for the next fight. But be warned, the enemies are evolving too and will stop at nothing to take you down. It's time to band together with your friends, create a killer strategy, and prepare for the fight of your lives. Will you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate neon-style shooter champion?

🔫 Co-op Mayhem:

Team up with up to 100 players to battle waves of supernatural foes in intense first-person shooter action. (not yet tested tho 😜)

📈 Evolutionary Progression:

Level up and vote for upgrades to tailor your character's skills as you adapt to the ever-growing threat.

🏆 Leaderboard Domination:

Collaborate with friends to claim the top spot on the leaderboard and showcase your survival prowess.

🌌 Rising Challenge:

Face an escalating difficulty as waves of enemies become more relentless, testing your teamwork and reflexes.

Join us on Discord:


If you want to be part of the community, feel free to join our discord server.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
